title: Spaghetti and meatballs
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '125g chopped onion', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped and divided', '900g passata', '500g tomato puree', '250ml water', '100g granualted sugar', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano, divided', '1 dried bay leaf', 'salt and pepper to taste', '450g minced beef', '55g Italian seasoned breadcrumbs', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '450g uncooked spaghetti']
